channel.title: Profiles on The South Atlantic News
channel.description: Recent content in Profiles on The South Atlantic News

item.title: Esther Chukwuoha
item.description:
Esther Chukwuoha

A passionate explorer of West and Southern Africa who tells the continent’s undiscovered stories from an African perspective.

item.title: Tobi Balogun
item.description:
Tobi Balogun

A writer and data scientist who enjoys utilizing numbers to create stories about Africa and South America.
